"双機銃はこう使うんですよお":
"Twin handguns are a gunner's weapon. It
combines showering your enemy in bullets
with acrobatics.

If you want to learn how to use them,
Lisa will give you some. Now, go
practice and cause pain!

※Twin Machineguns only.
Recomendado [Captura los Nab Rappy]."

"ツインマシンガン-NT
※1アカウントにつき1個、受注時に付与"
